Are you sure you want to delete this data?
The data will be deleted permanently
actions.discard_confirmation:
Are you sure you want to cancel editing?
Changes you made will be lost.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: Enter your registered email address and we will send you a verification link to reset your password.
forgot_password.email_sent: We've sent you a reset email
forgot_password.email_instructions: We have emailed you instructions for resetting your password, if your email is registered with us. You should receive them shortly.
forgot_password.check_spam_folder: If you do not receive an email, please make sure you have entered the address you registered with, and check your spam folder.
